title: Foxburg Chamber of Commerce seeking volunteers
text:
FOXBURG -- The Foxburg Chamber of Commerce invites our residents and surrounding community members to get involved! We’re looking for passionate people to volunteer, collaborate, help raise funds, and assist in planning upcoming events that make Foxburg shine.

When most people imagine an otter, they likely imagine a fluffy sea creature that floats in kelp beds off the coast of California. While the sea otter is certainly the most iconic species, most otter species live in freshwater, dwelling in rivers. This includes the Clarion River.
